item.title: About me
item.description: I graduated with my Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering from the University of Wisconsin-Madison in December 2016. For my Master’s research, I worked with Prof. Suman Banerjee, as part of the Wireless NetworkinG Systems (WiNGS Lab), on privacy in mobile sensing, wireless spectrum analysis and perception for home automation applications. One of the projects I worked on as part of the lab is now a startup (Emonix H2O), under the leadership of Neil Klingensmith.
